title: Abortion, Roe v Wade, and the Supreme Court: The Big Picture
sub_head: In Dobbs v. Jackson Women’s Health Organization, the justices have returned abortion policy to the states. Read the latest opinions from The Wall Street Journal.
body: Justice Samuel Alito’s majority opinion in Dobbs v. Jackson Women’s Health Organization has overturned Roe v. Wade and Planned Parenthood v. Casey and returned abortion policy to the states. The Opinion pages of The Wall Street Journal look at the history, facts and politics of the issue, and how the court’s decision might affect the political landscape.
